name: Real Time Strategy
description:
The RealTimeStrategy is a tool that includes necessary tools to create a Real Time Strategy game. It manages maps, units, buildings, resources, building placement, movement, UI, tasks, AI, combat, singleplayer, multiplayer and much more! It also supports multiplayer through steam. Currently under development.

   Roadmap
  • Singleplayer
  • Basic NPC
  • Multiplayer (Mirror & Steam)
  • Pathfinding (My pathfinding project will be implemented)
  • UI
  • Save System
  • Minimap
  • Unit Selection
  • Building Placement
  • Skill System (????)
  • Custom Unit Creation
  • Advanced AI
  • Healt System
  • Improved Unit Movement
  • Editor
